title: Oceanic chat rooms
body:
Guys we need to get word out for what chatrooms are actually being used cause im sure theres a few out there that i dont know about, if people know of any chatrooms please comment some in.
all i know of is:
Oceanic LoL
Looking for group

replies.body: There's some kind of roleplaying website too that creates match based on lore, but I forgot if it's on OCE or what it's even called. They have a bunch of chat rooms
